use.flag: Query the Pi-Top's battery status, via I2C.

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This is a modified version of the standard xfce4-battery-plugin. It is patched with code from rricharz (Rene Richarz) to query the status of the Pi-Top's battery over I2C (rather than using ACPI etc.); this code is activated by building with the pitop USE flag enabled.
Do _not_ set the pitop USE flag for use on an RPi3 that is not in a Pi-Top housing.
Use on Pi-Top machines requires that you have the rpi3-i2cdev boot service enabled, and that the I2C interface is activated (set 'dtparam=i2c_arm=on' in /boot/config.txt).
